data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
[i just applied for X500::DN a few minutes ago.]

    X500::RDN is used by X500::DN and comes with the same tarball. i
    don't know whether it makes sense to register it, it depends on
    whether registering is more for avoiding conflicts or more for
    listing modules to use. the latter case doesn't really apply, i
    doubt anyone will use X500::RDN without X500::DN.
